Text: to fire missles when shooting down migs the deafault keys are "shift + D" (the drop object/flour bomb key) it dont state it in the manual. it can be changed to a joystick button in the controls option in FSX.

Thanks Chuck. I'm not a huge fan of Abacus add-ons but i'll give this one a try.


BTW is N537JB around still, I heard he was looking for me ;)

no worries mogz. i know what you mean about abacus, im not much of a fan of their planes but extra missions are always good. the aircraft look good from the outside and fly quite nicely but as usual with abacus it looks like they ran out of time on the cockpits. its a fun add-on and a change from the usual comercial flying with FSX.
its worth the dl, ive been having fun crashing into the back of carriers all night

i aint seen N537JB's name around the bay for ages, thats twice you've asked tho, whats he looking for you for? he's probably incognito  ;)
